name: Drill Down
description:
A game made in 72hours for the ludum dare 48 , a turn based game with caves procedurally generated and 3 enemies (you heard right there lots of differnte enemies in this ) , you play as a miner that likes  dig tunnels (you can name him  BOB if you want or anything else except josh he doesn't like this name ) 

last 5 min change : now you have a ghost friend
